text: Christa Beatrice Miller (born May 28, 1964) is an American actress and model who has achieved success in television comedy. From 2009 to 2015, she starred in the TBS (formerly ABC) sitcom Cougar Town. She also plays Liz in the Apple TV+ series Shrinking. == Other websites == * Category:1964 births Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Models from Manhattan Category:American Roman Catholics Category:Actors from Manhattan Category:Living people
title: Christa Miller
